title: We Don't Like D**k Shooters - KF Stream Highlights #1
description:
Mike leads the first week of KF streams over on Twitch. He takes us to the Warzone, guides Greg through Bloodborne, and ruins the entire team dynamic with Ultimate Chicken Horse. 

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/kindafunnygames

Support us and get the shows early here! 
http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Mike - https://twitter.com/snowbikemike
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Nick - https://twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids
